title: Automate ASMR video creation and distribution with FalAI and social media integration
description:
üé¨ Create Unlimited Viral ASMR Videos ‚Äî Fully Automated!
Tired of spending hours brainstorming viral content, writing prompts, and juggling video uploads?
![sddefault.jpg](fileId:1660)
This powerful n8n workflow automates your entire short-form ASMR video creation process, turning you into a content powerhouse ‚Äî without burnout or repetitive manual work.

‚úÖ No coding required
‚úÖ Connects with cutting-edge AI video generation (FalAI)
‚úÖ Publishes videos to TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and more
‚úÖ Tracks everything neatly in Google Sheets
‚úÖ Ready for customization!

‚ú® How It Works
Here‚Äôs how this workflow becomes your virtual content assistant:

1. Brainstorm New Viral ASMR Objects
Generates a creative, unused idea like:

Glass Kiwi
Crystal Banana
Frozen Watermelon
Ensures fresh content by checking your Google Sheet for duplicates.

2. Generate a Detailed Video Prompt
Transforms your object idea into a sensory-rich ASMR video script:


‚ÄúImagine a crystal-clear kiwi sliced open, glistening under neon lights‚Ä¶‚Äù
This prompt is crafted to produce hyper-realistic AI visuals perfect for short-form platforms.

3. Create the ASMR Video with FalAI
Sends the prompt to FalAI, an advanced video-generation API.

Supports vertical aspect ratio for social reels.

Automatically waits for video processing to complete.

4. Save Video Details to Google Sheets
Adds each new object and video URL to a Google Sheet.

Maintains a running archive of all your generated videos.

No more manual tracking or losing track of which videos you‚Äôve already created!

5. Upload to Blotato and Publish Across Platforms
Uploads the video to Blotato‚Äôs media hosting service.

Optionally posts the video automatically to:

TikTok

Instagram

YouTube

And easily extendable to Facebook, Pinterest, and more!

Posts your captions, hashtags, and links seamlessly.

üéØ Why You‚Äôll Love This Workflow
‚úÖ Saves hours of creative work and publishing time
‚úÖ Eliminates manual uploads and spreadsheets
‚úÖ Keeps your content fresh and consistent
‚úÖ Highly customizable for new platforms or personal style
‚úÖ Includes clear instructions and sticky notes for easy setup

üí¨ Need Help?
If you get stuck:

Check the included sticky notes in the workflow canvas

Or search for ‚ÄúN8N Assistant by Nskha‚Äù on ChatGPT, and upload your JSON file for personalized support.

üéâ Supercharge Your Content Creation
This isn‚Äôt just a workflow ‚Äî it‚Äôs a full-scale ASMR content machine ready to scale your viral video production effortlessly. Automate your creativity and free up your time to focus on what matters most!

‚úÖ Ready to impress your audience and grow your brand?
Import this workflow today and start creating viral ASMR magic!
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
